banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: An interdimensional performance of imagination

recommendations.blurb: More resources curated by Particle Ink

recItems.blurb: Neil Gaiman is the master of magical realism -- he perfectly blends real-life, relatable characters with rich, dark fantasy, pulling from a wide range of different cultural mythologies and spiritual systems and weaving them in completely new ways into modern culture.
recItems.headline: The work of Neil Gaiman
recItems.label: EXPLORE

recItems.blurb: *The Neverending Story*, *Dark Crystal* and *Labyrinth*. Why? Mixing live actors with puppetry in fantastical landscapes, rich with lore and "weirdness," they are much darker than fantasy films of today. We have a  wish to bring back the imagination-sparking wonder lacking in today's fantasy worlds. Jim Henson and Brian Froud (the designer of the creatures and worlds in *Dark Crystal* and *Labyrinth*) are massive inspirations. His trolls book inspired the lore book we created.
recItems.headline: Dark fantasy films from the 1980s
recItems.label: WATCH

recItems.blurb: We are inspired by Tim Burton's consistent aesthetic, trademark color palettes and repeating themes across all his work. He created a universe for the weird ones, the outsiders, the kids that felt like they didn't belong.
recItems.headline: The work of Tim Burton
recItems.label: EXPLORE

recItems.blurb: The Major Arcana of the Tarot represents a set of universal archetypes -- situations, feelings and behaviors that everyone can relate to. For us, loosely basing a fantasy universe on the archetypes in the Tarot made perfect sense. The Tarot in itself can be seen as a journey of self-discovery or a spiritual path from the innocent "Fool" card to the wonder and fulfillment of the "World." The artwork on the cards is full of layered symbolism, which you can study, meditate upon and use as a tool to understanding your own psyche.
recItems.headline: The Major Arcana of the Tarot
recItems.label: EXPLORE

recItems.blurb: As a psychedelic philosopher and ethnobotanist, Terence Mckenna delivered hours of transcendent lectures on the nature of consciousness and came closer than anyone in his attempts to map out the bejeweled universe that can be visited in psychedelic space. He vividly and poetically described the "machine elves" that he and thousands of others have encountered. One can only guess that they might be just another incarnation of the Lumins in the 2.5th dimension. He was a fierce proponent of diving into these astral planes and attempting to bring something back. He was a big inspiration in the creation of our universe.
recItems.headline: The work of Terence Mckenna
recItems.label: EXPLORE

recItems.blurb: Grimes is an inspiring vision of the future, writing and producing all her music and creating the strong visual art and aesthetic surrounding it. She espouses a positive, ethical, beautiful vision for the future of the virtual world, wrapped in sci-fi storytelling and lore creation.
recItems.headline: Grimes
recItems.label: LISTEN

recItems.blurb: Brit Marling is the cowriter and star of the Netflix show *The OA*. This series explores themes of inter-dimensional travel and the afterlife -- but what's most inspiring is the originality of the super-natural concepts blended with real-life drama and relationships.
recItems.headline: The work of Brit Marling
recItems.label: EXPLORE

takeAction.blurb: Immerse yourself in Particle Ink's first live experience, now open in Las Vegas Arts District.
Learn more about the Particle Ink Metaverse, including NFTs, GameFi and other innovative technology.

nodes.whoTheyAre: Particle Ink tells epic stories in magical places.
nodes.whyListen:
Presented by the web3 entertainment technology company Kaleidoco, the Particle Ink metaverse seamlessly blends the virtual and physical worlds through mixed reality technologies. Particle Ink allows people to experience the "2.5th dimension," filled with mind-bending, interactive live portals and next-generation augmented reality technology -- all intended to connect and inspire.

Kaleidoco was founded by Jennifer Tuft and Cassandra Rosenthal in collaboration with the creative collective The LightPoets.

videoData.description: In a peek into their sprawling metaverse, Particle Ink dazzles with an interdimensional performance combining augmented reality, dance and video projected onto the TED stage.
